page.title: 13SHOPPING EDUCATION
page.content: {SHOPPING CONT.}The wife does the shopping 70%.Man and wife together 26% this is done any day. 94% buy frozen food.Buying clothes Hertford people shop in Stevenage 61% Enfield 12% Harlow 24% London 12% Hertford 26% W.G.C. 9%.{SHOPPING FOR FURNITURE.} Hertford 50%,Harlow 24%,,Stevenage 22%,W.G.C. 9%,London 6%,Potters Bar 6%,Hoddesdon 6%.{MEDICINE.}Boots chemist 74%.{EDUCATION & WORK.}39% were educated in Hertfordshire,28% in London and 33% elsewhere.61% continued after 16th.birthday.People change jobs 26% had had 5 jobs 30% 3 jobs and 1 person had had 10 jobs.People don't travel far to work,63% less than 5 miles.They either walk or go by car.Buses are not used.86% like their work.74% use their brains rather than their strength.The majority 68% work between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m.{PETS.}Most
